Reviews.Title: Swann SW-P-HGA Wireless Network Booster
Reviews.Author: Solarust
Reviews.Content: Unit boosted signal strength when attached to my network card, but failed to boost when attached directly to wireless sending unit, and actually produced reduced signal.  Did not meet up to expetations

Reviews.Title: not needed at all
Reviews.Author: Moetaz Thabet
Reviews.Content: The antena is not at all helpful. it does not improve the range significantly. It may be helpfull when using one camera only as it improves when pointing directly to the camera but still not imroving the reception noticably.

Reviews.Title: Swann SW-P-HGA Wireless Network Booster
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Twardy
Reviews.Content: Did nothing to improve my indoor reception,don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: SWANN DIVE
Reviews.Author: Donald Litman
Reviews.Content: Told by Swann Tech Support that their 2.4 Ghz wireless camera inside an average house would need a booster antenae to eliminate the interference. Bought this antenae and still got interference, so I called tech support and was then told their wireless camera system is not labeled correctly and it is unsuitable for use inside or in an urban area, because it gets interference from cell phones, microwaves, wireless phones and cable television. Swann tech support lied about needing this device, and it did not help at all to avoid interference or get a better image.

Reviews.Title: I don't know how much differance it makes.
Reviews.Author: John R. Slaughter
Reviews.Content: picture still comes in a little fuzzy. I'm not sure the booster makes any differance

Reviews.Title: network booster
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Simoneau
Reviews.Content: Money wasted.  I don't see where this helps at all.  Reception isn't any better with or without it.

Reviews.Title: Extend your Wi-Fi range
Reviews.Author: Kim L. Rozell "DVD_Man47"
Reviews.Content: I needed to extend my Wi-Fi range for the use of a laptop in the back yard.  Does the trick.  In fact, it extended my 200 foot range to 1,000 feet and still got a good signal. Very directional, high gain. Beats trying to run CAT-5 or CAT-6 cables that is for sure!

Reviews.Title: Network Booster
Reviews.Author: Thakur A. Seeram "Anthony Seeram"
Reviews.Content: This item did not work out for me and I would like to send it back if possible.

Reviews.Title: Disappoint
Reviews.Author: radario
Reviews.Content: We still unable to installon the roof the antenna because looks like need to conect a receiver, and I can't find on your site, and the antenna doesn't come with any instruction.Can you help us with that?
